name: Brain Challenge (itch)
description:
Welcome to this new brand Puzzle Game “Brain Challenge”, The Glass is empty at start and you will have to fill the glass with happy water. The water is coming from different pipes and you have to fill the glass with drawing lines.
Come up with new innovative solutions to play the game, use physics rule, and draw the line to complete each level of happy water glass. You have to find the best solution to draw line to fill the glass to get 3 stars. If you are good in physics, you will enjoy the game at an extreme level.
Now it’s your turn to see how many stars you make!
Brain Challenge will increase your creativity, innovation, imagination, and concentration. You see an empty glass with a sad mood, but once you fill the glass with happy water, it turns to a happy mood.
Use your skills to get three stars in all the levels. As you complete each level you will see that it gets harder, so don't hesitate to use the Hint button.
How to play
This new brain challenge game is designed with cool and addictive gameplay. Place your finger on screen, draw line with pencil to make perfect path for falling water. Save water by leading it to smiley glass. Remember, minor mistake in line draw can cause of wasting water or fall down the empty glass. So, be careful while draw line to save water and fill the glass with water.

Features:
Draw Line Puzzle
This sketching puzzle game enables you to draw line puzzle with different creative designs by using your skills on your screen to lead the falling water into empty glass to solve physics puzzle.

Brain Puzzle Challenge
This is one of the best brain physics games which gives you best experience of brain teasing game by solving physics puzzles and draw lines.

Enhance Brain Power
There are lot of interesting and mind challenging levels in this Brain Challenge game, which helps to increase your brain power by exercising brain to solve tricky physic puzzle.

Draw Line & Path Draw
This brain physics puzzle is one of the best draw line puzzle game in all best brain puzzle games free. You have to full concentrate while draw line puzzle and path draw to lead water perfectly into water glass.
Challenge your brain by playing this Happy Full Glass game and test your brain skills by solving challenging and tricky levels of this new physics puzzle and draw line puzzle game.
